content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_campfire
inventory=[{"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 42, "index": 10}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 26, "index": 17}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "mycelium", "quantity": 25, "index": 27}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 24, "index": 28}, {"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "rabbit_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 37}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "birch_wood", "quantity": 2, "index": 45}]

thought: I want to craft a soul_campfire, which requires placing sticks and soul soil in the crafting grid. The first step is to place a stick in the center of the crafting grid, so I move the stick from slot 35 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1
